main.name: Santiago Garcia II
main.bio: Hello World! I'm a Bradley University graduate that majored in Computer Science. So far in my software engineering experience, I have worked on many different types of programming projects in school, in my internships, or in my free time. This lead to being exposed to and have great experience in a plethora of programming languages and frameworks.

education.description: A member of Society of Hispanic Professional Engineers(SHPE) club

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
